verbs.description: [ARG1: Johnny Damon] [V: is] [ARG2: a policy wonk] ? Apparently so . The former Red Sox centerfielder was at the White House this week as part of the President ’s Council on Sports , Fitness and Nutrition — Patriots coach Bill Belichick is also on the panel — and afterward Damon said he ’s totally down with Trump . But what about the president ’s critics ? “ That ’s alright . Half the people are n’t supporters , but he ’s doing a great job , ” Damon told TMZ . Asked ...
